code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[host,setHost]=useState('');const[action,setAction]=useState('');const[output,setOutput]=useState('');const runScript=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/run-script',{host,action});setOutput(res.data);}catch(err){setOutput(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Web Tool"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"\u0418\u043C\u044F \u0445\u043E\u0441\u0442\u0430",value:host,onChange:e=>setHost(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"\u041E\u0431\u043D\u043E\u0432\u043B\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0435 Firefox",value:action,onChange:e=>setAction(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:runScript,children:"\u0412\u044B\u043F\u043E\u043B\u043D\u0438\u0442\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:output})]});}export default App;
